title: Bug 6322All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322All types dialog shows obfuscated classes JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: This classes show upprominently in the Open Type dialog.
SR: Options:a) sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letterb) filter them out completly.I suggest to a)
